description: Nonogram puzzles, which are also known as griddlers, paint-by-numbers, hanjie, etc., are puzzles made up of cells in a grid that must be colored or left blank in order to reveal a picture. The puzzles contain numbers for each grid row and column that indicate the number of colored square sets. With this information, you must choose which squares are colored and which squares are blank in order to solve the puzzle and reveal the image.

common_filenames.description: jalbum-settings.jap - The default name given to jAlbum JAP projects.
